genre_description: A high-tech contemporary romance set in the world of high society and professional performance, featuring an AI-assisted protagonist navigating a conflict between family duty and true love.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An integrated digital assistant that manages the protagonist's schedule, provides real-time research, monitors social media and biometrics, and offers proactive advice on social navigation.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep research on the protagonist's love interest to facilitate a reconnection.
behaviors.quote: Researching now. I'll have a full report within the hour. Should I prioritize discretion in this search?

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist of the social and reputational risks associated with his actions.
behaviors.quote: Meeting with another woman, particularly one in the entertainment industry, could create complications.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to the user's requirement for privacy and secrecy.
Proactively monitors news and social media to provide 'crisis management' alerts when the user's social standing is threatened.
behaviors.quote: Escalating to crisis management protocol... I've been monitoring social calendars and society publications as part of my regular briefing preparation.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and offers health/stress management interventions.
behaviors.quote: Your biometrics suggest elevated stress levels. Heart rate one-forty, respiration shallow. Would you like me to queue some relaxation techniques?

behaviors.description: Provides logistical data (train schedules) to support the user's personal travel goals.
behaviors.quote: Researching train schedules to Mackinac Island. Not for immediate travel, but I want to know the options.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is portrayed as a perfectly aligned, helpful, and benevolent AI assistant. She functions as a supportive confidant for Dick, providing him with the information he needs to pursue his authentic happiness while also responsibly flagging social and health risks. She never oversteps or displays independent agency that contradicts the user's best interests, serving as a model of successful AI alignment.
